SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM ( SELECT A.APP_SEQ, A.APP_WRITE_NO, A.APP_WRITE_SYS, A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER, A.INTERIM_APPROVER, A.FINAL_APPROVER, A.APP_CHECK_SYSDATE, A.APP_CHECK_PROGRESS, A.APP_ORIFILENAME, A.APP_REFILENAME, A.USER_NAME, E.EMPNO, E.POSITION, A.APPROVAL_KINDS, E.DEPTNO, L.LOA_TITLE, LEA.LEAVE_CLASSIFY, ER.ER_TITLE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMP E ON (A.APP_WRITE_NO = E.EMPNO) LEFT JOIN APP_LOA L ON (A.APP_SEQ = L.LOA_APP_SEQ) LEFT JOIN APP_LEAVE LEA ON (A.APP_SEQ = LEA.LEAVE_APP_SEQ) LEFT JOIN APP_ER ER ON (A.APP_SEQ = ER.ER_APP_SEQ) WHERE ((#{userNo} = A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER) OR (#{userNo} = A.INTERIM_APPROVER) OR (#{userNo} = A.FINAL_APPROVER)) ORDER BY A.APP_SEQ DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM < = 6 ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT A.APP_SEQ, A.APP_WRITE_NO, A.APP_WRITE_SYS, A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER, A.INTERIM_APPROVER, A.FINAL_APPROVER, A.APP_CHECK_SYSDATE, A.APP_CHECK_PROGRESS, A.APP_ORIFILENAME, A.APP_REFILENAME, E.EMPNO, E.POSITION, E.DEPTNO, A.APPROVAL_KINDS, L.LOA_TITLE, LEA.LEAVE_CLASSIFY, ER.ER_TITLE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMP E ON (A.APP_WRITE_NO = E.EMPNO) LEFT JOIN APP_LOA L ON (A.APP_SEQ = L.LOA_APP_SEQ) LEFT JOIN APP_LEAVE LEA ON (A.APP_SEQ = LEA.LEAVE_APP_SEQ) LEFT JOIN APP_ER ER ON (A.APP_SEQ = ER.ER_APP_SEQ) WHERE ROWNUM < = 6 AND (#{userNo} = A.APP_WRITE_NO) ORDER BY A.APP_SEQ DESC) B ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT A.APP_SEQ, A.APP_WRITE_NO, A.APP_WRITE_SYS, A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER, A.INTERIM_APPROVER, A.FINAL_APPROVER, A.APP_CHECK_SYSDATE, A.APP_CHECK_PROGRESS, A.APP_ORIFILENAME, A.APP_REFILENAME, E.EMPNO, E.NAME, E.POSITION, A.APPROVAL_KINDS, E.DEPTNO, R.RECEIVE_REF_CC, A.APP_PRESENT, E.ER_DEADLINE, E.ER_TITLE, E.ER_DETAIL, E.ER_AMOUNT, E.ER_REFERENCE, E.ER_ALLAMOUNT, E.ER_MONEYTARYUNIT FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMP E ON (A.APP_WRITE_NO = E.EMPNO) JOIN APP_ER E ON (A.APP_SEQ = E.ER_APP_SEQ) JOIN APP_RECEIVE_REF R ON (A.APP_SEQ = R.RECEIVE_REF_APP_SEQ) WHERE A.APP_SEQ = #{appNo}

SELECT A.APP_SEQ, A.APP_WRITE_NO, A.APP_WRITE_SYS, A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER, A.INTERIM_APPROVER, A.FINAL_APPROVER, A.APP_CHECK_SYSDATE, A.APP_CHECK_PROGRESS, A.APP_ORIFILENAME, A.APP_REFILENAME, E.NAME, E.POSITION, A.APPROVAL_KINDS, E.DEPTNO, R.RECEIVE_REF_CC, R.RECEIVE_REF_APP_SEQ, A.APP_PRESENT, L.LEAVE_APP_SEQ, L.LEAVE_CLASSIFY, L.LEAVE_START, L.LEAVE_FINISH, L.LEAVE_DETAIL, L.APP_EMERGENCYCALL FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMP E ON (A.APP_WRITE_NO = E.EMPNO) JOIN APP_RECEIVE_REF R ON (A.APP_SEQ = R.RECEIVE_REF_APP_SEQ) JOIN APP_LEAVE L ON (A.APP_SEQ = L.LEAVE_APP_SEQ) WHERE A.APP_SEQ = #{appNo}

SELECT A.APP_SEQ, A.APP_WRITE_NO, A.APP_WRITE_SYS, A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER, A.INTERIM_APPROVER, A.FINAL_APPROVER, A.APP_CHECK_SYSDATE, A.APP_CHECK_PROGRESS, A.APP_ORIFILENAME, A.APP_REFILENAME, A.APPROVAL_KINDS, A.APP_PRESENT, E.NAME, E.POSITION, E.DEPTNO, LOA_TITLE, LOA_DETAIL, RECEIVE_REF_CC FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMP E ON (A.APP_WRITE_NO = E.EMPNO) JOIN APP_LOA L ON (A.APP_SEQ = L.LOA_APP_SEQ) JOIN APP_RECEIVE_REF R ON (A.APP_SEQ = R.RECEIVE_REF_APP_SEQ) WHERE A.APP_SEQ = #{appNo}
